ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can youdo when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: I just did shar vahl essence from 102 on up. I just gathered a bunch of payala fruit then went and killed a bunch of desert madmen for water so I wouldn t have
ygData.messageBody:
I just did shar vahl essence from 102 on up. I just gathered a bunch of
payala fruit then went and killed a bunch of desert madmen for water so I
wouldn't have to buy water... Actually came out with a profit even though I
couldn't sell the shar vahl essence to any players. It was fun. :-)
luv,
-Su

> I think it's used as a temper for the racial needle or tannin for the
> racial robes, but I'd have to look it up. I've got my brewing to 113 with
> skull ale and am going to switch back to shar vahl essence once that
trivs.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su <suceress@...>
> To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, September 04, 2003 3:09 AM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can
> youdo when it does
>
>
> >
> >
> > > One problem with the war is it can screw up the zone until the server
> > > is reset. They have patched it but it still breaks, though less
> > > often. But it is fun!
> > > If you want to increase your brewing cheaply just gather Payala fruit
> > > in Shadeweaver Thicket and combine it with water. It's a ground drop
> > > so anyone can find it. Just look for the blue topped trees. It
> > > makes Shar Val essence, triv at 180+.
> > >
> > Heh. Got my brewing to 184 so far. :-)
> > A couple months ago I practiced going around the trees in the zone and
got
> > it down so that by the time I got back to the starting point the fruit
> > repopped. Got lots of lots of the payala fruit.
> > Is Shar Vahl essence good for anything? I have tons of it.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
